moves.2. Nc3: yes, I know I should do d4 but I am terrible at the exchange and advanced variation(you don't care-lol)
moves.2... f5: his weird move hence the name of this game-trying to transpose to a dutch
moves.3. Nh3: I am preparing for a gambit
moves.5. Bxd3: i am up in compensation: 3 pieces active for a pawn
moves.5... g6: blocked my plan on getting the queen out
moves.7... Be7: bg7 was worse due to Ne4
moves.8... d5: could've castled but I would knight sac on g6 and earn the rook later
moves.9. O-O-O: i did a passive move like him
moves.9... Nc6: he thinks his defense is stable but nxg6-the rook backs up the h file
moves.10... Bxf6: can you see my next move
moves.12... Rf8: cant castle either because of Nxf6 then bishop C4 check (Rxd8 kills the queen)
moves.13... Rxf6: if the queen took rook e1+ compensation I think
moves.17... Bd7: I missed checkmate but he admit defeat-the weirdest game of the century(in my opinion)he was a worthy foe indeed

gameName: just plain wierd- this happened for real
